Text: Remember: Noone but YOU who download is responsible for any viruses that YOU get in YOUR computer. Downloading EXE files from someone who felt like making a game, isn't always safe..
I assure everyone this is truly my own game I made and no viruses are in it.  Thanks for the reminder KConrad.  Really, I only posted my game to see if anyone would like it.
This game isn't combinatorial right? Since you can't move you're opponents pieces it's considered "unfair" right? Any ideas on to wich player the advantage lays?
